name: Chomp and Stomp
description:
Stomp around a City  during a meteor shower with a Buddy. Creating Chaos as you duke it out to see who is the best.

Dodge the falling Meteors .

To add to the chaos you can Stun each other with your attacks.

Game is Controller compatible.

KEYBOARD  CONTROLS

Player P1 Controls

JumpwMoveLeftAMove RightDShootETail WhackQ

Player P2 Controls 

Jump Up  ArrowMoveLeft Left  Arrow Move Right Right ArrowShoot KTail Whack J
